channel.title: Post pictures of your computer/audio setup
channel.description:
I use to see alot of peoples cool ass computers on Reinet, so I want to see what people have got here :P
Heres mine: 15 Inch Sub, Surround 8 Inch Sound, Audio changer from TWO TVs, Guitar and my computer. 500 Watt amplifier powering it all. Modified Dimension 2400 to have 1.5Gigs of ram, 2.8 processor, 300GB Hard Drive, 1GB/s Wireless, Radeon 9800(256MB)Graphics, with a second moniter on opposite side of my room hooked up, duplicating my main moniter for watching movies near my bed. [img]http://img142.imageshack.us/img142/5871/minimyroom12my.jpg[/img] [img]http://img372.imageshack.us/img372/4972/minimyroom26wj.jpg[/img]

item.title: Post pictures of your computer/audio setup
item.dc:creator: @frank frank_
item.description:
@frank wrote:

[quote=“Mr.Chris, post:23, topic:670”][quote author=Pwnd link=topic=487.msg53603#msg53603 date=1151255280]

When my other computer is being used. This is how i play. Simply not enough room on one screen.

The computer on the left’s ‘explorer.exe’ failed. So, your setup sucks xd

And, Mopman, it’s possible that’s what she was looking for. If so,
i h0p3 2 h4x u|2 4n0r suM dai!
[/quote]

Explorer just got owned…[/quote]noobses k? its a second screen… he has 2 rs apps open.

item.source: Post pictures of your computer/audio setup

item.title: Post pictures of your computer/audio setup
item.dc:creator: @Slayerexpert Slayerexpert
item.description:
@Slayerexpert wrote:


Since I'm too lazy to take another pic, this is my old setup (sorta). There me, playing RS (aw how cute), probably a year ago, no speakers o.0, mah ViewSonic 17 Inch monitor (yeah baby), my mutilated iPod headphones, and an original Dark Forces box sitting under my desk =D. Oh yeah, about the computer, it's nothing fancy,
2.8ghz P4
512 RAM
GeForce4 NVidia Mx4000
CD-RW and DVD
A cool little vent on the side
A cool little light-up blue LED power switch
Wireless Internet Adapter
Windows Xp Service Pack 2
Thousands of dollars of software...

This is sorta considered my setup, because my dog's always in my room....so yeah

Read full topic

item.title: Post pictures of your computer/audio setup
item.dc:creator: @noob noob
item.description:
@noob wrote:

yna_ajhear5:

Cyberpower custom

2 years old now.
AMD Athlon XP 3200+
2.19GHz, 512MB of RAM
Windows XP Professional SP2 Version 2002.
ViewSonic VE500 on NVIDIA GeForce FX 5200
2 Drives: Drive C: Total = 111GB/51.9GB Used. Drive F: Total = 189GB/24.0GB Used.
Creative SoundBlaster 5.1 Sunnond auidio speakers with full bass support.

Yeah, you know you like me specs. They were top notch two years ago!

What da hell, are you only using 51GB & 24GB if i got as good comp it would download all new cool games, and i goes 4 games on 24GB, so doesnt seem like you many games.
PS: I love big harddrives. im gonna buy a 250GB USB disk soon. (if i ever get my money from my mom, lol)

Read full topic

item.source: Post pictures of your computer/audio setup

item.title: Post pictures of your computer/audio setup
item.dc:creator: @Bumis Bumis
item.description:
@Bumis wrote:

I'm pretty good too noob, my friend had 4,000 dollars and I put together a computer for him, clear acrylic case, neon blue lights imbedded in the wires, 8 speed fan control with 6 fans hooked up, tempature monitor that shut his computer off if it overheated, 3.6 ghz processor, 4GB of ram, Radeon 9800, a Soundblaster card with 6.1 Doulby, and his motherboard supported 8 gigs of ram, 2 300GB hard drives with fan coolers that were neon blue, probably other shit i'm forgetting as well.

Bunch of shit went into that thing, took me a while to find the parts.

Read full topic
item.source: Post pictures of your computer/audio setup

item.dc:creator: @noob noob
item.description:

Or my sucky Fujutsi-Siemens, 2,2Ghz, 512mb ram.

I like computers its fun to mod computers and build, but i don't got any money thats why....

Otherwise i would own you ALL!

Read full topic
